category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ME_defer_commit_in_clone
preference.preference_description: Enables defer commit for Oracle Database during cloning of a structure in the Manufacturing Process Planner application. If the value is 'true', Oracle transaction parameters are set to commit redo logs in BATCH and NOWAIT. For Oracle Database version lower than 11, the parameter value is as follows - COMMIT_WRITE='BATCH,NOWAIT'. For Oracle Database version equal to or higher than 11, the parameters values are as follows - COMMIT_WAIT='NOWAIT' COMMIT_LOGGING='BATCH'. The default value of the preference is false.
